pages.text: It's possible to hide in blocks.$(br2)Hiding players get harder to find by enemies. Name is also hidden from other players.$(br2)These below blocks is you can hide in$(list)Leaves block$(list)Hay block

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(list) Press Hide-In-Block Key($(k:parcool.HideInBlock)) while sneaking near blocks you want to hide in
